thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Flow Traders Reports Q4 NTI up 24% at 39.3 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Flow Traders Reports Q4 NTI up 24% at 39.3 Million Euros
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - FLOW TRADERS NV:
* REG-FLOW TRADERS REPORTS NTI 24% GROWTH IN 4Q17, PROPOSES FINAL DIVIDEND OF € 0.35, STRONG START TO 2018
* ‍FLOW TRADERS PROPOSES FINAL FY17 DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.35.​ * FY18 COST GROWTH GUIDANCE REITERATED AT A MAXIMUM OF 15% ANNUALLY
* STRONG GROWTH TREND WITNESSED IN THE ETP INDUSTRY IN 2017, EXPECTED TO CONTINUE IN 2018 AND BEYOND
* ‍4Q17 NET TRADING INCOME (NTI) WAS EUR 39.3M (+24% Q-O-Q)​
* ‍4Q17 EBITDA MARGIN WAS 34%, LEADING TO AN EPS OF EUR 0.17 (+43% Q-O-Q)​
* PROPOSES A TOTAL DIVIDEND OVER 2017 OF EUR 0.65 * Q4 FLOW TRADERS ETP VALUE TRADED EUR 164.0 BILLION VERSUS EUR 162.3 BILLION IN Q3
* ‍4Q17 ETP VALUE TRADED ROSE TO EUR 164BN (+1% Q-O-Q)​ * Q4 NET PROFIT EUR 7.9 MILLION VERSUS EUR 5.6 MILLION IN Q3 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
